運転免許証...添付ファイルを参照してください。

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Fwd: FORWARD YOUR FULL BANK INFORMATION TO ME IMMEDIATELY.
conversations.body:
---------- Forwarded message ---------
Dear Sir,
Thanks for your email. today morning I visited the bank branch to get bank
details. Sir, as per your request I enclosed bank details, my passport, my
mobile number, and address with this email.   Sir, I am somewhere at
different place.  you are giving life to me and I must thank god.  I dont
want 50%. out of 4.5m, I will take one and i can use 3.5 for orphange.
Sir, I would like to give a suggestion. Instead  of giving to different
orphanage, we shall open an account and deposit those money as a fixed. so
that, every month orphange will get interest money and it will be long term.
Sir, for wire transfer (different currency), I enclosed pdf with this email
NAME: V N SHIVAKUMAR
ADDRESS: No.65, 7TH STREET, SAI NAGAR, CHENNAI 600 092
COUNTRY /; INDIA
OCCUPATION: SUPERVISOR IN A PRIVATE ORGANISATION
SEX: MALE
DOB: 09TH JULY, 1975
Bank Account Details :
Bank Name: AXIS BANK Ltd
Branch: Anna Salai branch
Bank Address: No. 225, Anna Salai, Opp.Spencer Plaza, Chennai 600002, INDIA.
Customer Id : 168026891
Account No : 168010100227803
IFS Code : UTIB0000168
Website : www.axisbank.com
Thanks
Regards
Shivakumar
On Wednesday, March 8, 2023 at 02:00:57 PM GMT+5:30, Justin Watts <
jw65106218@gmail.com> wrote:
My dear,
the woman that dropped this charity money said that you will use 50 percent
for your own personal use,
the remaining 50  percent  you will share it to the orphanage,
This is her last wish: make sure that you do as she instructed,
so that her soul will rest in peace..
